title: Social Media Privacy
Keep Software Updated
context: Review your social media privacy settings regularly. Make your profiles private, limit who can see your posts, and be cautious about sharing personal information like your location, phone number, or address.

Regularly update your operating system, apps, and antivirus software. Security patches fix known vulnerabilities that hackers exploit. Enable automatic updates when possible to ensure you always have the latest protections.

content_item.context: Regularly update your operating system and apps...
